subject: Economy
A_hi: विभक्ति में अपने पुनरानुमान के साथ
C_hi: विभक्ति की आत्मनिष्ट राजनीतिक पैमरों को तिकित नेशनल पैमरों की पैमरों
explanation_en: GDP at constant national prices represents the total value of all goods and services produced in a country's economy during a specific period (usually a year), adjusted for price changes.
explanation_hi: विभक्ति की नेशनल पैमरों के मान रखते हैं परमियां की पैमरों
question_en: In economics, what is the term ‘Gross Domestic Product’ (GDP)?

question_hi.subject: Economics
question_hi.question_en: What is the formula used to calculate Gross Domestic Product (GDP)?
question_hi.explanation_en: GDP is calculated by adding nominal GDP (NA), Income from abroad (IE), Financial Income (FI), and Foreign Direct Investment (FDI).
question_hi.explanation_hi: GDP कलायकरण की मानियत (NA), देश फॉर्वर्जन (IE), वितरित इन्कार्यारणी (FI), aur विद्यापिक द्यारणी (FDI) कलायकरण
question_hi.explanation_en: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is computed by adding nominal GDP (NA), income from abroad (IE), financial income (FI), and foreign direct investment (FDI).
